com.cs301w01.meatload.controllers

Class PictureManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cs301w01.meatload.controllers.PictureManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FController

    public class PictureManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements FController
    Implements Controller logic for Picture objects.
    Author:
    Isaac Matichuk

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PictureManager(Context context, int picID)
      Constructor, creates a PictureManager and sets the Picture ID to the supplied int.
      PictureManager(Context context, Picture picture)
      Constructor, sets Context for db use and set the picture ID to the ID of the supplied picture

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addTag(java.lang.String tagName)
      Adds a new tag to a picture, using a String instead of a tag object.
      void deletePicture()
      Delete the Picture associated with this PictureManager object in the database.
      void deleteTag(java.lang.String tagName)
      Remove a tag from the picture associated with this PictureManager object.
      Picture getPicture()
      Returns a picture object of the picture that is associated with this PictureManager
      java.util.ArrayList<Tag> getTags()
      Returns the current unsaved list of tags on the current picture this list is not necessarily consistent with what is in the database because this includes the users current unsaved changes
      void savePicture(Picture picture)
      Updates the database to reflect any changes that were made to the fields in the edit picture activity
      void setContext(Context context)
      Sets the current PictureManager's Context.

    • Method Detail

      • setContext

        public void setContext(Context context)
        Sets the current PictureManager's Context. A context is necessary if the database is going to be used. The context is set upon creation of the manager object but this context is invalidated as soon as the user leaves the screen so every activity that stores a manager needs to update the context on resume
        Parameters:
        Context -

      • savePicture

        public void savePicture(Picture picture)
        Updates the database to reflect any changes that were made to the fields in the edit picture activity
        Parameters:
        picture - New Picture with updated information.

      • getPicture

        public Picture getPicture()
        Returns a picture object of the picture that is associated with this PictureManager
        Returns:
        Picture

      • deletePicture

        public void deletePicture()
        Delete the Picture associated with this PictureManager object in the database.
        See Also:
        PictureQueryGenerator

      • addTag

        public void addTag(java.lang.String tagName)
        Adds a new tag to a picture, using a String instead of a tag object. Note: this change does not take effect in the database until the user presses save
        Parameters:
        tagName - String object representing the tag to be added to this picture

      • deleteTag

        public void deleteTag(java.lang.String tagName)
        Remove a tag from the picture associated with this PictureManager object. Note: this change does not take effect in the database until the user presses save
        Parameters:
        tag - Tag to be removed.

      • getTags

        public java.util.ArrayList<Tag> getTags()
        Returns the current unsaved list of tags on the current picture this list is not necessarily consistent with what is in the database because this includes the users current unsaved changes
        Returns:
        ArrayList
